name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.
schedule:
1:  Introduction
2-5: Personal Narrative: A Story of Anger, Jealousy, or Fear
6-8: Super powers: If I could . . . I would
9: Midterm
10-12:  News Story: Q&A
13-15: Photographs
16-17:  Film and discussion

Grading for midterm and final projects on will be based on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, and effort.
